ygData.subject: Re: [gladiator] GI: Basic Intelligence
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey, i forgot to say this with Bugs, but when you said Basic intelligence, I remember charming a ghost that had no attack. If you did scare, it scared itself

Hey, i forgot to say this with Bugs, but when you said Basic intelligence, I 
remember charming a ghost that had no attack. If you did scare, it scared 
itself all the way to the corner of the level and tried to push itself 
through the wall.
